value.title: Microsoft And NetCom Learning Collaborate To Deliver Hands-On Workshops On Power Apps & Power BI
value.excerpt: Microsoft and NetCom Learning collaborate to offer Power Apps & Power BI workshops. NetCom Learning is proud to collaborate with Microsoft to conduct complimentary 8-Hour virtual instructor-led training workshops on Microsoft Power BI and Microsoft Power Platform.

value.title: Power BI Report Server May 2023 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the May 2023 Power BI Report Server release! This release has a number of great new features like the Report Server accessibility tagging for screen-reader report consumers, as well as updates to existing features for Modeling, and Reporting.

value.title: Power BI Desktop to end support for Windows 8.1, new features unveiled
value.excerpt: Today, as part of its monthly feature summary for Power BI Desktop, the tech giant has also revealed that support for the data analytics service on Windows 8.1 will be ending on January 31, 2024. Aside from this announcement, a bunch of new features have ...

value.title: Power BI February 2023 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the February 2023 update! This month, we’ve added TypeScript support in the developer playground sandbox, several new formatting features for reporting, and so much more. Continue reading for more details on our new features!

value.title: Power BI September 2022 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the September 2022 update. We are thrilled to announce a variety of new features such as hierarchical axis by default, translations for composite models, mobile formatting options general availability and cross tenants’ datasets sharing. There is more to explore, please continue to read on.

value.title: Announcing: Action bar for interactive reports in the Power BI tab for Microsoft Teams
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce that the Power BI tab in Microsoft Teams is getting a new action bar for interactive reports. The action bar enables users in the Power BI tab to use all the capabilities they have in the service when interactive reports are added to channels, chats, or meetings in Microsoft
